pages.text: The illagers are persistent with hunting down those who have delved into the dark arts. With a bunch of their skulls and a shrieker from the dark, you've found a way to remind them of their place.
The Shrieking Obelisk lets out a fearful shriek that wards off any illagers that tries to launch an assault upon you. It requires to be placed on top of a filled Cursed Cage to be active.
Tall Skulls placed around the Obelisk, like the blocks around a Beacon, though only on the outlines, will increase the Shrieking Obelisk's radius of effect.
